name: Solarion
originalText:
Sunburst (This comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana used to pay its cost.)
{T}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Solarion.

rulings.text: “Double” has its normal English meaning. If Solarion had three +1/+1 counters on it, it would end up with six +1/+1 counters on it.

text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
{T}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Solarion.
